Thankyou, my son loves it.
Fast download, easy install.

Hey guys i need help when i double click on the launcher it comes up as a black screen and i see the loading splash screen fro like 0.1 if a second i have changed the compatibility and it still doesn't work....... I am running Windows 7 64-bit with 4000MB graphics and Nvidia GTX 465 PLz help i love this game!!!
When I start the game it says insert CD. How to fix this  ??
it needs cd can any one help????
Use Daemon Tools and mount the ISO file for CD not inserted and also try running the game as Administrator by right clicking
I used to play this game when i was really really yough, and all i want now is have the good old times back :P
What the hell I only get some Image files, the fuck I got to do, lol? :P

Ah, I got it. Thx again bro. :p Just open the Image thingy with poweriso tap the "browse" thing :P

Thx
